title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when I create a new file f1.txt and select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: I expect that when I select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all the saved files should be closed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file named f1.txt.
3. Go to the file menu and select 'Close All Saved'.
